The move came on solid volume too with far more shares changing hands than in a normal session. This breaks the recent trend of the company, as the stock is now trading above the volatile price range of $44.34 to $50.62 in the past one-month time frame. The stock was driven after U.S. sanctions were implemented against a Russian manufacturer of aluminum.
